page.title: 09Godalming Library
page.content: At Godalming Library they have 40 000 books and 29 000 are taken out every month. About 500 people come in every day and 1500 books are taken out. The most popular age group which are served are those between 30 and 60 years of age. The library is most busy on Tuesdays because they are open from 10.00am-8.00pm. The library is not just used for books. It is used for ballet and keep-fit classes not to mention concerts. The library has 10 staff 3 full-time and 7 who work part-time. The most popular kind of book which is taken out is fiction. The library has special books for blind and disabled. There is a mobile library which travels all around the Godalming area.
